training.capstone.pharma

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • training.capstone.pharma.HomeController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/")
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    The HomeController class handles HTTP requests related to patients and orders.

      • addNewPatient

        @PostMapping(value="/addPatient")
public PatientEO addNewPatient(@RequestBody
                                                                  PatientEO patient)
        Registers a new patient and adds them to the system.
        Parameters:
        patient - The patient information to be added.
        Returns:
        The newly added patient's details.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the user with the given email already exists.

      • addNewOrder

        @PostMapping(value="/addOrder")
public java.lang.String addNewOrder(@RequestBody
                                                                     PatientEO patientDet)
        Adds a new order to a patient's record.
        Parameters:
        patientDet - The patient's email and the order to be added.
        Returns:
        A status message indicating success or failure.

      • findPatientWithOrdersById

        @GetMapping(value="/PatientOrders/{PatientId}")
public PatientEO findPatientWithOrdersById(@PathVariable(value="PatientId")
                                                                                            java.lang.String patientId)
        Retrieves a patient's details along with their orders by patient ID.
        Parameters:
        patientId - The ID of the patient.
        Returns:
        The patient's details along with their orders.

public OrderEO findOrderById(@PathVariable(value="OrderId")

      • updateOrderStatusOfPatient

        @PostMapping(value="/updateOrderStatus")
public void updateOrderStatusOfPatient(@RequestBody
                                                                                 StatusEO data)
        Updates the status of an order for a patient.
        Parameters:
        data - The email, order ID, and new status to be updated.

      • findAllOrdersOfPatients

        @GetMapping(value="/findAllPatientOrders")
public java.util.List<PatientEO> findAllOrdersOfPatients()
